name: Quest for Glory 1: So You Want to Be a Hero
name_original: Quest for Glory 1: So You Want to Be a Hero
description:
Quest for Glory 1: So You Want to Be a Hero is an adventure-RPG game developed by Sierra On-Line. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Sierra On-Line. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Quest for Glory 1: So You Want to Be a Hero is available on PC.
